title: Kaadhal Cassata Lyrics Kappal Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Kaadhal Cassata Lyrics from Kappal Tamil Movie
Singer(s): Sathya Prakash, Saindhavi, Yuki Praveen
Lyricist: Karky

basundhi paarvai
nee veesi sendraai.
Soan puppadi sorkkal
nee pesi sendraai.

Gulfi barby
gulfi mookkaale nee
en kannathai theendaadhe.

Candy crushin meedhu
aadayin viral un nenjiloda.
Mittaai kadaikkul
vandha erumbai pola
naanum unnil oorgiren.
ottu moththamaai
thithikkuraai nee
poovin raththamai
jamun-il moonaai
jamaththil aanaai.

aam.
Sirippi always chilling me
pirivu always killing me
yeah
un eyes-ai paarthadhaale
ice cube-aai aaneney.

pathaale inikkum
sweet stall-e.
parvayaal enaiyum
iluththaale.
thiththikkum hormone
unnai nenachaale.
paththikkum
ne vandhu anaichaale.

Chocolate sirppam ondru
muthtam kettu nirkkudhendru
nee ippa meedhu moikka
ayyam kollum eeyai pola
ennai paarkkiraai
enna nirkkiraai.
vaayai vaikkathaan
nee thudikkuraai.
Paalkova lavaai
pongattum vaa.

basundhi paarvai
nee veesi sendraai.
Soan puppadi sorkkal
nee pesi sendraai.

there is no one like you
may be there but I don't care.
